com.facebook.buck.config

Interface ConfigView<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Config type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSandboxConfig, AppleConfig, ArtifactCacheBuckConfig, CachingBuildEngineBuckConfig, ChromeTraceBuckConfig, DoctorConfig, JavaBuckConfig, ModernBuildRuleConfig, ParserConfig, ResourcesConfig, SandboxConfig, ScribeEventListenerConfig, ToolConfig

    public interface ConfigView<T>
    A view of a particular config class.

    A config class may implement extra state and accessors beyond the bare Config. ConfigViews provides domain-specific accessors to Config values.

    ConfigViews should be defined following this pattern. 

      @Value.Immutable(builder=false, copy=false)
  @BuckStyleImmutable
  abstract class AbstractFooConfigView implements ConfigView {
    // Additional accessors.
  }
    Config views should also not declare any additional non-derived immutable fields if it's to be used with ConfigViewCache. As the cache assumes one-to-one correspondence with the main config instance, it uses the generated factory FooConfigView.of(T delegate) to instantiate the view.
